text: Kananjalo Senza abo Sabakhethayo kwizicaka zeThu baba ziindlalifa zeNcwadi, ukanti phakathi kwabo kukho lowo uzenza ubugwenxa (ngokwenza izono) kuze phakathi kwabo kubekho lowo uphakathi kuphinde kubekho abo bahamba phambili ngezenzo ezilungileyo ngokuvunyelwa nguAll√¢h.
